I haven't committed the tools in here to my svn repository, since space is limited for me.  Here's an index:

7zip - http://7-zip.org (zip/unzip)
fxcop - http://www.pnpguidance.net/post/DownloadFxCop136NETCodeAnalysisTool.aspx (static analysis of source)
ncover - http://www.ncover.com (code coverage analysis)
rhino.mocks - http://www.ayende.com/projects/rhino-mocks.aspx (mocking framework for unit testing)
svn - http://subversion.tigris.org (source control)
sysinternals - http://www.sysinternals.com -> SysInternals Suite package (diagnostics utilities)
TypeResolver - http://www.codeplex.com/TypeResolver (test different implementations of classes)
watin - http://watin.sourceforge.net (browser automation from within unit tests)
xunit - http://www.codeplex.com/xunit (unit testing framework)
